Emerging growth company&nbsp; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;5.02. Departure of Directors or Principal Officers; Election of Directors; Appointment of Principal Officers. (b) Director retirement. Charles H. Noski and Helmut Panke, each of whom has served on the Microsoft Board of Directors since 2003, have informed the Company they have decided to retire from the Board and will not seek re-election at the 2019 annual shareholders meeting on December&nbsp;4, 2019. Their retirement will be effective on that date. Item&nbsp;9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits (d) Exhibits: &nbsp; 99.1 &nbsp; Press release, dated September&nbsp;19, 2019, issued by Microsoft Corporation SIGNATURE Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; MICROSOFT CORPORATION &nbsp; (Registrant) Date: September&nbsp;19, 2019 &nbsp; / S / K EITH D OLLIVER &nbsp; Keith Dolliver &nbsp; Assistant Secretary
